body:
@CrystalVulpine has decided to turn this once great guild into a [tool for Ruqqus drama](https://ruqqus.com/+foxes/post/667b/fuck-your-preferrential-treatment-admins), that is quite sad so I made +Foxes2 for a place to post cute foxes without being ruled over by a hypocritical GM. 

Come join the power-mod free alternative today!

body: Guys, come on. This is actually a toddler-level temper tantrum. Nothing was stopping you from posting in this guild until you learnt that the GM has a different opinion than the Discord echo-chamber. Now suddenly we need a whole new guild for foxes, because for whatever reason people can't handle seeing *one post* calling them out. Embarassing tbh.

body:
Nice strawman, too bad you forgot to give it a brain.

First of all, they're aren't any declared rules of the guild.

Second of all, it was a site-wide protest spanning across multiple guilds criticizing the admins actions. But before you say that's not allowed, let me remind you that you were complicit in the invalid siege of +forbiddenfacts when @Emerald41 used her alt @Sapphire41 to siege by accepting the guildmaster invitation to +forbiddenfacts.

Modlog where you accepted guildmaster invitation: https://ruqqus.com/+ForbiddenFacts/mod/log/1ei

Modlog proving Emerald41 used an alt to siege: https://ruqqus.com/+ForbiddenFacts/mod/log/1e7

Edit: in fact if you want to go even further, it's reasonable to say you knew you were being invited by alt account, since it was @Sapphire41 who invited you.

Modlog where @Sapphire41 invited you: https://ruqqus.com/+ForbiddenFacts/mod/log/1ef

I think it's reasonable to say you must have at least been aware of @Emerald41 at the time. So it's also probably reasonable to assume you would know it's her alt as well.

body:
You're entitled to your opinion of the GM. However, making a the new +Foxes2 over one post is petty, in my opinion.

>I don't need you to white knight for CV fam, he's a big boi and can talk himself.

It's also an open comments section, and I'm allowed to state my opinion on the matter. Although, I'm sure CV will defend themselves when they get the chance.

body: Get bent, dude. @CrystalVulpine made a single post as part of a protest that was damn near site-wide. Now I'm not up on everything going on, but your reaction is absurd. In my experience, @CrystalVulpine is a very laissez-faire mod, so you immediately reacting in this way to something as utterly harmless as a single protest post makes me lean towards CV's side of things.
